author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
The City of Los Angeles is using taxpayer money to defend itself in a lawsuit accusing it of laundering taxpayer funds to “fix” the homelessness crisis, one that has only gotten significantly worse the more money thrown at it.

Los Angeles Democrats are using taxpayer money to hire an 11 person law firm to cover up the missing homeless money

This private law firm will be used to defend the billions of dollars in missing homeless funds the city can’t account for against the federal government’s probes pic.twitter.com/XqSjDfL7Ou
— Wall Street Apes (@WallStreetApes) June 6, 2025
title: Democrat-run city is using taxpayer funds to hire an expensive law firm to defend ITSELF against homelessness corruption
